defaultProvider.description: The AI provider to use for agent invocations

defaultModel.description: The model identifier to use (must be non-empty)

defaultThinkingLevel.description: The thinking level to pass to the agent

trustPolicy.description: Trust-level gating policy for controlling agent capabilities per actor

trustedUsers.description: GitHub usernames that receive full (trusted) agent capabilities

semiTrustedRoles.description: GitHub permission levels that receive semi-trusted (read-only) agent capabilities

untrustedBehavior.description: How to handle untrusted actors: respond with a read-only explanation or block entirely

limits.description: Cost and resource boundaries for agent runs

maxTokensPerRun.description: Maximum total tokens (input + output) allowed per agent run

maxToolCallsPerRun.description: Maximum number of tool calls allowed per agent run

workflowTimeoutMinutes.description: Hard time boundary in minutes for the agent workflow (GitHub Actions max: 360)
